detail_desc: Sunglasses with transparent plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Oversized jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a wide, foldover polo neck, low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and a slit at the front of the hem.

Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved romper suit in soft terry made from an organic cotton blend with a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Press-studs at the back of the neck, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 0-2Y, and elasticated hems.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft cotton jersey.
A pair of hoop earrings in metal decorated with studs.
Short, straight-style T-shirt in soft jersey with ribbing around the neckline and an embroidered motif at the top. The cotton content of the T-shirt is organic.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tie-front hem.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Lightly padded parka in woven fabric with a brushed velvety finish. Detachable, lined hood with a quilted edge and fake drawstring with leather details, a stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard and wind flap with toggles. Patch front pockets with a flap and button, fake welt chest pockets, a small appliqué on one sleeve, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Removable lining.

Trousers in an airy weave, one pair made of cotton chambray and the other of viscose. Elastication and a twisted drawstring at the waist, side pockets and narrow elastication with a small frill trim at the hems.
Short skater skirt in soft fabric. Unlined.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
High-waisted suit trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, and slim, tapered legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with narrow sides, cutaway coverage at the back and a low waist with covered elastication.

Short coat in a soft, felted wool and cashmere blend with narrow notch lapels and a concealed double-breasted fastening at the front. Dropped shoulders, wide turn-ups at the cuffs, large patch front pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Short, fitted skirt woven in a slightly stretchy, patterned cotton blend with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Gathered seams at the front, back and sides for a draped effect. Lined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a coated finish, contrasting colour zips and a detachable, pile-lined hood. Stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard at the front, zipped front pockets and ribbed cuffs. Pile lining.
Straight-cut blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Long balloon sleeves with elastication, decorative ties and a flounce at the cuffs.
Dungaree dress in slightly stretchy cotton twill with sewn-on shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Patch front pockets, back pockets, a seam at the waist and an A-line skirt.

Padded all-in-one suit in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front that continues part-way down one leg, a zipped chest pocket and elastication at the back, cuffs and hems. Reinforced at the knees and back, reinforced elastic straps at the hems and reflective details. Fleece lining. The all-in-one suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Top in cotton jersey with a motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Slightly rounded hem.
Blouse in airy, crinkled, patterned chiffon with a V-neck, buttons down the front, 3/4-length trumpet sleeves and a flared hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Long coat in pile with narrow notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless dress in an organic cotton weave with buttons down the front and flared hem. Lined at the top.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with a collar and short puff sleeves with scalloped, crocheted trims. Press-studs at the back of the neck and at the crotch.

Calf-length dress in lace with scalloped, V-shaped flounces front and back. High collar, covered buttons and an opening at the back of the neck, short, scalloped sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. V-shaped, gathered seam at the waist and a flared, scallop-hemmed skirt. V-neck underdress in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. The polyamide content of the dress’s outer layer is recycled.
Cotton canvas shoes with lacing at the front, rubber toe caps, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Sandals in imitation leather with decorative appliqués at the front and an adjustable heel strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles.
Calf-length pleated skirt in an airy weave covered in sequins. High waist with visible elasticated ribbing, and soft draping. Lined in airy jersey.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist. Two pairs with an all-over print and one with scalloped hems.
V-neck top in satin with a lace trim at the top of the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Metal rings in various designs. Four decorated with sparkly plastic beads.
Hat in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend containing some wool with an imitation leather appliqué, faux fur pompom on the top and earflaps with ties. Fleece lining.
Backpack in woven fabric with a print motif, a handle and adjustable shoulder straps. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and mesh side compartment. Partly lined. Size 13x27x35 cm.

Set with a long-sleeved jersey bodysuit and dress in organic cotton. Patterned bodysuit with a concealed press-stud on both shoulders. Dress in soft chambray with frills, shoulder straps that cross and fasten at the back, and elastication at the back of the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, inside-out, rib-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
All-in-one suit in soft fleece with a hood, zip down the front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist, narrow sides and a high cut at the back.
Short skirt in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with soft lace trims. Non-wired padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Fitted, lightly padded jacket in a quilted weave with a zip down the front and a lightly padded hood with a wide, soft faux fur trim. Diagonal, zipped front pockets and long sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs. Elasticated drawstring to define the waist and narrow, concealed elastication at the hem. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Push-up lace bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cheeky briefs in microfibre with a lace back section, low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back.
5-pocket denim jeans with ultra-flexible stretch that keeps them in shape while providing full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Wrist warmers in soft, rib-knit cashmere with thumbholes.
Cable-knit hat with a faux fur pompom.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and wide elastication with a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Top in supersoft sweatshirt fabric made from a viscose blend with a brushed finish. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with beaded appliqués.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length dress in jersey with a slight sheen, with a collar and concealed zip at the top. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short, crinkled jersey top in a narrow cut at the top with short, spaghetti shoulder straps and a racer back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Top in slub cotton jersey with appliqués on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Polo shirt in organic cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and button placket. Short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in a sturdy, patterned jacquard weave with a high waist, fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, fake welt pockets at the back and tapered legs with creases.
One-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit with a shoulder strap, long sleeves and ribbing at the top, cuffs and hem.
Sports trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with contrasting colour side panels at the top and ribbed hems.
Soft, non-wired bandeau bras in cotton jersey and lace. Lined at the front. No fasteners.

Lined bikini top with removable inserts and a decorative double layer of mesh frills. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, a metal fastener at the back, a silicone trim at the top and side support.
5-pocket jeans in stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Long dress in a cool cotton and silk weave with a round, neckline with gathers for added width. Concealed buttons at the top, short, wide raglan sleeves and a gathered seam at the hem for extra width.
Ankle-length trousers in a softly draping weave. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Short, wide top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves held together with metal rings. Ribbing around the neckline and a raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, fitted dress in soft, patterned jersey with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front with a drawstring at one side. Long sleeves and an asymmetric hem.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy viscose weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets and a rounded hem.
Pool shoes with a fabric strap and hook and loop fastening (sizes 7-9 with a strap around the heel). Fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.

T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif.

Set with a jacket and pair of trousers in thermal fleece made partly from recycled polyester. Jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and raglan sleeves. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener. Side support and a silicone trim.
Blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, button placket and short, wide sleeves with gathers at the shoulders. Narrow, elasticated seam at the back of the waist and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Bras in cotton jersey with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
